onyomiExamples.meaning: immediate, prompt, quick, rapid, urgent, pressing
immediate, prompt, quick, rapid, urgent, pressing
at once, immediately, without delay, promptly

kunyomiExamples.meaning: fast, quick, hasty, brisk, early (in the day, etc.), premature, (too) soon, not yet, (too) early, easy, simple, quick
already, now, by this time, quick, early, fast, rapid
arrow with feathers that curve to the left (the first of two arrows to be fired)
to be brought forward (e.g. by three hours), to be moved up, to be advanced, to be hasty, to be rash, to quicken, to speed up, to gather speed
to bring forward (e.g. by 3 hours), to advance, to hasten (e.g. one's death), to expedite, to precipitate, to quicken (e.g. one's step), to speed up, to accelerate
